attributes.action: A petition to get Boris Johnson removed as prime minister.
attributes.background: I would like Boris Johnson removed as prime minister as he failed the country when handle the coronavirus pandemic and has put the NHS in the worst imaginable position and put them on there last legs. We need a strong prime minister who won’t do countless u-turns and will be strong and trustworthy.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked.
